Package coreapi

Class Cafeteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • coreapi.Cafeteria
  • public class Cafeteria
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a Cafeteria with associated orders and its own stock of products.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Borja

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Cafeteria​(int assignedId, java.lang.String givenName)
      Creates a new instance of a cafeteria, with its own name and an identifier to be related by orders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Add the indicated amount of product stock to this cafeteria.
      java.util.List<Product> getAvailableProducts()
      Returns the list of available products in this cafeteria.
      int getId()
      Returns the unique id assigned by the info database to this specific cafeteria.

      Returns the name assigned by the info database to this specific cafeteria.

      Returns the list of orders registered to this cafeteria.

      Returns the current stock of the indicated product available in this cafeteria.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cafeteria

        public Cafeteria​(int assignedId,
                 java.lang.String givenName)
        Creates a new instance of a cafeteria, with its own name and an identifier to be related by orders. To be used only by the designers of the information database.
        Parameters:
        assignedId - the identifier assigned to this cafeteria.
        givenName - the name assigned to this cafeteria.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns the unique id assigned by the info database to this specific cafeteria.
        Returns:
        the identifier of this cafeteria.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name assigned by the info database to this specific cafeteria.
        Returns:
        Returns the name of this cafeteria.

      • getAvailableProducts

        public java.util.List<Product> getAvailableProducts()
        Returns the list of available products in this cafeteria. The list is a read-only copy of the products available for purchase in the cafeteria, even if there's no stock of them at the moment.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of available products in this cafeteria.

      • registerProduct

        public void registerProduct​(Product prod,
                            int quantity)
        Registers a new product as available on this cafeteria.
        Parameters:
        prod - A reference to the product to add to this cafeteria.
        quantity - The amount of quantity of product to register to the stock.

      • getProductQuantity

        public int getProductQuantity​(Product prod)
        Returns the current stock of the indicated product available in this cafeteria.
        Parameters:
        prod - The identifier of the product to check for.
        Returns:
        Returns the amount of stock in this cafeteria from the indicated product.

      • addProductStock

        public void addProductStock​(Product prod,
                            int quantity)
        Add the indicated amount of product stock to this cafeteria.
        Parameters:
        prod - The product for which to add stock.
        quantity - The quantity of product to add.

      • removeStock

        public void removeStock​(Product prod,
                        int quantity)
                 throws InsufficientStockException
        Removes the indicated amount of product stock from this cafeteria. Keep in mind that removing all stock of this product does NOT remove the product from the cafeteria, to do so, use the removeProduct() method instead.
        Parameters:
        prod - The product from which to remove stock.
        quantity - The amount of product to remove from the stock of this cafeteria.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException - If the amount to be removed is greater than the current stock of the indicated product.

      • removeProduct

        public void removeProduct​(Product prod)
        Removes the product from the list of available products from this cafeteria.
        Parameters:
        prod - The product to remove.

      • registerOrder

        public void registerOrder​(Order newOrder)
        Registers an order as pertaining to this cafeteria.
        Parameters:
        newOrder - The order to register to this cafeteria.

      • getOrders

        public java.util.List<Order> getOrders()
        Returns the list of orders registered to this cafeteria.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of orders registered to this cafeteria.
